metadata.title: CVE-2019-17531 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind2.0.0 through 2.9.10. When Default Typing is enabled (either globally orfor a specific property) for an externally exposed JSON endpoint and theservice has the apache-log4j-extra (version 1.2.x) jar in the classpath,and an attacker can provide a JNDI service to access, it is possible tomake the service execute a malicious payload.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
